workExperience.title: Waste Mangement Worker
workExperience.info: As a recycling worker, I am responsible for sorting, processing and managing recycclable materials to ensure proper waste disposal and enviormental sustainability

workExperience.title: Postal Carrier
workExperience.info: As a postal carrier at Postnord, I was responsible for delivering mail and packages to customers, ensuring timely and accurate delivery while maintaining excellent customer service.

workExperience.title: Gatekeeper
workExperience.info: As a gatekeeper at Stora Enso, I was responsible for controlling access to the facility, ensuring that only authorized personnel and vendors entered the premises. I maintained security protocols, managed visitor check-ins, and contributed to the overall safety and efficiency of the operations.
merits: Collaboration with law enforcement & emergency services
